heroData.heroText: Hello! My name is Edgar. My passion is creating beautiful fullStack applications.
heroData.aboutText:
I’m a mysterious individual who has yet to figure out my bio. One thing’s for certain: I love writing code to solve problems! 

Im a JAVA focused fullStack Developer equipped with just the right amount of javascript (ReactJS, NodeJs), UI/UX, and SQL to build and deliver fast, resilient and scalable solutions.
